Verses: 1 isravel Puththirarin Sabaiyaar Ellaarum Mudhalaam Maadhaththil Seenvanaandharaththile Serndhu, Janangal Kaadhesile Thangiyirukkaiyil, Miriyaam Maranamadaindhu, Ange Adakkampannappattaal.
2 janangalukkuth Thanneer Illaadhirundhadhu; Appozhudhu Avargal Mosekkum Aaronukkum Virodhamaagak Koottankoodinaargal.
3 janangal Moseyode Vaakkuvaadham Panni: Engal Sagodharar Karththarudaiyasannidhiyil Maandapodhu Naangalum Maandupoyirundhaal Nalamaayirukkum.
4 naangalum Engal Mirugangalum Inge Saagumpadi, Neengal Karththarin Sabaiyai Indha Vanaandharaththile Konduvandhadhu Enna;

5 vidhaippum, Aththimaramum, Dhraatchachchediyum, Maadhalanchediyum, Kudikkath Thanneerum Illaadha Indha Ketta Idaththil Engalaik Konduvarumbadi, Neengal Engalai Egipthilirundhu Purappadappanninadhu Enna Endraargal.
6 appozhudhu Moseyum Aaronum Sabaiyaarai Vittu, Aasarippuk Koodaaravaasalil Poi, Mugankuppura Vizhundhaargal; Karththarudaiya Magimai Avargalukkuk Kaanappattadhu.
7 karththar Moseyai Nokki:

8 nee Kolai Eduththukkondu, Neeyum Un Sagodharanaagiya Aaronum Sabaiyaaraik Koodivarachcheydhu, Avargal Kangalukkumunne Kanmalaiyaip Paarththup Pesungal; Appozhudhu Adhu Thannidaththilulla Thanneeraik Kodukkum; Ippadi Nee Avargalukkuk Kanmalaiyilirundhu Thanneer Purappadappanni, Sabaiyaarukkum Avargal Mirugangalukkum Kudikkak Koduppaai Endraar.
9 appozhudhu Mose Thanakkuk Karththar Kattalaiyittapadiye Karththarudaiyasannidhiyilirundha Kolai Eduththaan.

10 moseyum Aaronum Sabaiyaaraik Kanmalaikku Munbaaga Koodivarachcheydhaargal; Appozhudhu Mose Avargalai Nokki: Kalakakkaarare, Kelungal, Ungalukku Indhak Kanmalaiyilirundhu Naangal Thanneer Purappadappannuvomo Endru Solli,
11 than Kaiyai Ongi, Kanmalaiyaith Than Kolinaal Irandudharam Adiththaan; Udane Thanneer Eraalamaaip Purappattadhu, Sabaiyaar Kudiththaargal; Avargal Mirugangalum Kudiththadhu.

12 pinbu Karththar Moseyaiyum Aaronaiyum Nokki: Isravel Puththirarin Kangalukku Munbaaga Ennaip Parisuththam Pannumpadi, Neengal Ennai Visuvaasiyaamar Ponapadiyinaal, Indha Sabaiyaarukku Naan Koduththa Dhesaththirkul Neengal Avargalaik Kondupovadhillai Endraar.
13 inge Isravel Puththirar Karththarode Vaakkuvaadhampanninadhinaalum, Avargalukkulle Avarudaiya Parisuththam Vilanginadhinaalum Idhu Meripaavin Thanneer Ennappattadhu.
14 pinbu Mose Kaadhesilirundhu Edhomin Raajaavinidaththukku Sthaanaapadhigalai Anuppi:

15 engal Pidhaakkal Egipthukkup Ponadhum, Naangal Egipthile Nedunaal Vaasampanninadhum, Egipthiyar Engalaiyum Engal Pidhaakkalaiyum Ubaththiravappaduththinadhum, Ivaigalinaal Engalukku Neritta Ellaa Varuththamum Umakkuth Therindhirukkiradhu.

16 karththarai Nokki Naangal Mandraadinom; Avar Engalukku Sevikoduththu, Oru Thoodhanai Anuppi, Engalai Egipthilirundhu Purappadappanninaar; Ippozhudhu Naangal Umadhu Ellaikku Utpatta Kaadhes Ooril Vandhirukkirom.

17 naangal Umadhu Dhesaththin Vazhiyaaik Kadandhupogumpadi Uththaravu Kodukkavendum; Vayalveligal Vazhiyaagavum, Dhraatchaththottangal Vazhiyaagavum Naangal Pogaamalum, Thuravugalin Thanneerai Kudiyaamalum, Raajapaadhaiyaagave Nadandhu, Umadhu Ellaiyaik Kadandhupogumattum, Valadhupuramum Idadhupuramum Saayaadhiruppom Endru, Umadhu Sagodharanaagiya Isravel Solli Anuppugiraan Endru Solla Sonnaan.
18 adharku Edhom: Nee En Dhesaththin Vazhiyaaik Kadandhupogak Koodaadhu; Ponaal Pattayaththode Unnai Edhirkkap Purappaduven Endru Avanukku Solla Sonnaan.

19 appozhudhu Isravel Puththirar Avanai Nokki: Nadappaana Paadhaiyin Vazhiyaai Povom; Naangalum Engal Mirugangalum Un Thanneeraik Kudiththaal Adharkuk Kirayankoduppom; Verondrum Seyyaamal, Kaalnadaiyaai Maaththiram Kadandhupovom Endraargal.
20 adharku Avan: Nee Kadandhupogak Koodaadhu Endru Solli, Vegu Janangalodum Palaththa Kaiyodum Avargalai Edhirkkap Purappattaan.
21 ippadi Edhom Than Ellaivazhiyaaik Kadandhupogumpadi Isravelarukku Uththaravu Kodukkavillai; Aagaiyaal Isravelar Avanai Vittu Vilagipponaargal.
22 isravel Puththiraraana Sabaiyaar Ellaarum Kaadhesai Vittup Prayaanappattu, Or Ennum Malaikkup Ponaargal.
23 edhom Dhesaththin Ellaikku Arugaana Or Ennum Malaiyile Karththar Moseyaiyum Aaronaiyum Nokki:

24 aaron Than Janaththaarode Serkkappaduvaan. Meripaavin Thanneeraippatriya Kaariyaththil Neengal En Vaakkukkuk Keezhppadiyaamarponapadiyinaal, Naan Isravel Puththirarukkuk Kodukkira Dhesaththil Avan Pravesippadhillai.
25 nee Aaronaiyum Avan Kumaaranaagiya Eleyaasaaraiyum Koottikkondu, Avargalai Or Ennum Malaiyil Erappanni,
26 aaron Uduththirukkira Vasthirangalaik Kazhatri, Avaigalai Avan Kumaaranaagiya Eleyaasaarukku Uduththuvaayaaga; Aaron Ange Mariththu, Than Janaththaarode Serkkappaduvaan Endraar.
27 karththar Kattalaiyittapadiye Mose Seydhaan; Sabaiyaar Ellaarum Paarkka Avargal Or Ennum Malaiyil Erinaargal.

28 ange Aaron Uduththirundha Vasthirangalai Mose Kazhatri, Avaigalai Avan Kumaaranaagiya Eleyaasaarukku Uduththinaan; Appozhudhu Aaron Ange Malaiyin Uchchiyile Mariththaan; Pinbu Moseyum Eleyaasaarum Malaiyilirundhu Iranginaargal.
29 aaron Jeeviththupponaan Enbadhai Sabaiyaar Ellorum Kandapodhu, Isravel Vamsaththaar Ellaarum Aaronukkaaga Muppadhu Naal Dhukkankondaadinaargal.
